item.title: GOP firebrands Boebert, Burlison introduce bill to abolish ATF

item.title: Bernie Sanders takes heat for blaming California wildfires on climate change: 'Global warming ate my homework'
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders is facing pushback for what some social media users say is promoting climate alarmism amid raging California wildfires.
